item.description:
Muy feliz ano nuevo a todas, espero que se la hayan pasado muy bien.

Join us for a Spanish language film, "Stranded" and a brief discussion afterwards in the cafe at Real Artways. The story, briefly, is as follows: In 1972, a young rugby team from Montevideo, Uraguay, boarded a plane for a match in Chile and then vanished into thin air. Seventy-two days later, two days before Christmas, sixteen of the forty-five passengers miraculously resurfaced. Thirty-five years later, the survivors returned to the crash site -- known as the Valley of Tears -- to recount their harrowing story of defiant endurance and indestructible friendship in this powerful documentary.

A full description is on the Real Artways website: http://www.realartway...

I recommend clicking on the hyperlink for Andrew O'Hehir's Review of the movie. He writes, "It's clear that these articulate, handsome men, now in their 50s and 60s, feel ennobled, and not ashamed, by having endured one of the worst situations imaginable."

Nos vemos!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Spanish Movie Night at Real Artways: "Stranded"
